sense.gloss: to think (about, of), to think over, to ponder, to contemplate, to reflect (on), to meditate (on)
to consider, to bear in mind, to allow for, to take into consideration
to think (that), to believe, to hold (a view), to judge, to conclude, to suspect
to intend (to do), to think of (doing), to plan
to predict, to anticipate, to expect, to imagine
to come up with, to think up, to contrive, to devise
to consider (as), to regard (as), to look on (as), to take, to view
bill, check, account, payment (of a bill), settlement (of an account)
splitting the cost, splitting the bill, Dutch treat
each paying for his own account, sharing the expenses, Dutch treat

sdata.j: ↑勘定↑↓かんじょう↓お↑願↑↓ねが↓いします。
↑勘定↑↓かんじょう↓↑書↑↓しょ↓をお↑願↑↓ねが↓いします。
↑勘定↑↓かんじょう↓を↑頼↑↓たの↓むよ。
お↑勘定↑↓かんじょう↓して↑下↑↓くだ↓さい。
↑君↑↓きみ↓が↑勘定↑↓かんじょう↓を↑払↑↓はら↓うべきではなかったんだ。
sdata.e: You shouldn't have paid the bill.

sdata.j: ↑教授↑↓きょうじゅ↓がみんなの↑勘定↑↓かんじょう↓を↑払↑↓はら↓ってくれた。
sdata.e: Our professor paid the bill for all of us.

sdata.j: ↑勘定↑↓かんじょう↓は↑硬貨↑↓こうか↓で↑支払↑↓しはら↓われた。
sdata.e: The bill was paid in coin.

sdata.j: ↑勘定↑↓かんじょう↓お↑願↑↓ねが↓いします。
↑勘定↑↓かんじょう↓↑書↑↓しょ↓を↑頼↑↓たの↓むよ。

words.gloss: to think (about, of), to think over, to ponder, to contemplate, to reflect (on), to meditate (on)
